@typescript-eslint/adjacent-overload-sig.name: @typescript-eslint/adjacent-overload-signatures
@typescript-eslint/adjacent-overload-sig.description: 重载的函数必须写在一起
@typescript-eslint/adjacent-overload-sig.comments:
/**
     * 重载的函数必须写在一起
     * @reason 增加可读性
     */
@typescript-eslint/adjacent-overload-sig.badExample: declare namespace NSFoo1 { export function foo(s: string): void; export function foo(n: number): void; export function bar(): void; export function foo(sn: string | number): void; } type TypeFoo1 = { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; bar(): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; }; interface IFoo1 { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; bar(): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/adjacent-overload-sig.goodExample: declare namespace NSFoo2 { export function foo(s: string): void; export function foo(n: number): void; export function foo(sn: string | number): void; export function bar(): void; } type TypeFoo2 = { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; bar(): void; }; interface IFoo2 { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; bar(): void; }

@typescript-eslint/brace-style.name: @typescript-eslint/brace-style
@typescript-eslint/brace-style.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/brace-style.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/comma-spacing.name: @typescript-eslint/comma-spacing
@typescript-eslint/comma-spacing.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/comma-spacing.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-asser.name: @typescript-eslint/consistent-type-assertions
@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-asser.description: 类型断言必须使用 as Type，禁止使用 <Type>，禁止对对象字面量进行类型断言（断言成 any 是允许的）
@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-asser.comments:
/**
     * 类型断言必须使用 as Type，禁止使用 <Type>，禁止对对象字面量进行类型断言（断言成 any 是允许的）
     * @reason <Type> 容易被理解为 jsx
     */
@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-asser.badExample: let bar1: string | number; const foo1 = <string>bar1; const baz1 = { bar: 1 } as object; However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-asser.goodExample: let bar2: string | number; const foo2 = bar2 as string; const baz2 = { bar: 1 } as any;

@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-defin.name: @typescript-eslint/consistent-type-definitions
@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-defin.description: 优先使用 interface 而不是 type

@typescript-eslint/dot-notation.name: @typescript-eslint/dot-notation
@typescript-eslint/dot-notation.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/dot-notation.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/explicit-member-acces.name: @typescript-eslint/explicit-member-accessibility
@typescript-eslint/explicit-member-acces.description: 必须设置类的成员的可访问性
@typescript-eslint/explicit-member-acces.comments:
/**
     * 必须设置类的成员的可访问性
     * @reason 将不需要公开的成员设为私有的，可以增强代码的可理解性，对文档输出也很友好
     */
@typescript-eslint/explicit-member-acces.goodExample: class Foo2 { private static foo = 'foo'; public static getFoo() { return Foo2.foo; } public constructor() { } protected bar = 'bar'; public getBar() { } public get baz() { return 'baz'; } public set baz(value) { console.log(value); } }
@typescript-eslint/explicit-member-acces.reason: 将不需要公开的成员设为私有的，可以增强代码的可理解性，对文档输出也很友好

@typescript-eslint/func-call-spacing.name: @typescript-eslint/func-call-spacing
@typescript-eslint/func-call-spacing.description: 要求或禁止在函数标识符和其调用之间有空格
@typescript-eslint/func-call-spacing.badExample: fn (); fn (); const map = new Map<string, number> (); However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/func-call-spacing.goodExample: fn(); const map = new Map<string, number>();

@typescript-eslint/indent.name: @typescript-eslint/indent
@typescript-eslint/indent.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/indent.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/keyword-spacing.name: @typescript-eslint/keyword-spacing
@typescript-eslint/keyword-spacing.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/keyword-spacing.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/member-ordering.name: @typescript-eslint/member-ordering
@typescript-eslint/member-ordering.description: 指定类成员的排序规则
@typescript-eslint/member-ordering.comments:
/**
     * 指定类成员的排序规则
     * @reason 优先级：
     * 1. static > instance
     * 2. field > constructor > method
     * 3. public > protected > private
     */
@typescript-eslint/member-ordering.badExample: class Foo1 { private getBar3() { return this.bar3; } protected getBar2() {} public getBar1() {} public constructor() { console.log(Foo1.getFoo3()); console.log(this.getBar3()); } private bar3 = 'bar3'; protected bar2 = 'bar2'; public bar1 = 'bar1'; private static getFoo3() { return Foo1.foo3; } protected static getFoo2() {} public static getFoo1() {} private static foo3 = 'foo3'; protected static foo2 = 'foo2'; public static foo1 = 'foo1'; } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/member-ordering.goodExample: class Foo2 { public static foo1 = 'foo1'; protected static foo2 = 'foo2'; private static foo3 = 'foo3'; public static getFoo1() { } protected static getFoo2() { } private static getFoo3() { return Foo2.foo3; } public bar1 = 'bar1'; protected bar2 = 'bar2'; private bar3 = 'bar3'; public constructor() { console.log(Foo2.getFoo3()); console.log(this.getBar3()); } public getBar1() { } protected getBar2() { } private getBar3() { return this.bar3; } }
@typescript-eslint/member-ordering.reason:
优先级：
1. static > instance
2. field > constructor > method
3. public > protected > private

@typescript-eslint/method-signature-styl.name: @typescript-eslint/method-signature-style
@typescript-eslint/method-signature-styl.description: 接口中的方法必须用属性的方式定义

@typescript-eslint/naming-convention.name: @typescript-eslint/naming-convention
@typescript-eslint/naming-convention.description: 代替 JS 规则 camelCase 的 TS 规则
@typescript-eslint/naming-convention.comments: /** 代替 JS 规则 camelCase 的 TS 规则 */
@typescript-eslint/naming-convention.badExample: const FOO = 123; export const isTrue = true; export const foo = 123; export const bar = 'abc'; export const INSTANCE = new Object(); export const OBJ = {}; interface fOo { __str__: string; } class fOo implements fOo { __str__ = 'foobar'; public Print() { this.__log__(); } private __log__() { console.log(this.__str__); } } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/naming-convention.goodExample: const foo = 123; export const IS_TRUE = true; export const FOO = 123; export const BAR = 'abc'; export const instance = new Object(); export const obj = {}; interface Foo { str: string; } class Foo implements Foo { str = 'foobar'; public print() { this.log(); } private log() { console.log(this.str); } }

@typescript-eslint/no-array-constructor.name: @typescript-eslint/no-array-constructor
@typescript-eslint/no-array-constructor.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/no-array-constructor.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/no-dupe-class-members.name: @typescript-eslint/no-dupe-class-members
@typescript-eslint/no-dupe-class-members.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/no-dupe-class-members.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/no-empty-interface.name: @typescript-eslint/no-empty-interface
@typescript-eslint/no-empty-interface.badExample: interface Foo1 {} However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-empty-interface.goodExample: interface Foo2 { foo: string; }

@typescript-eslint/no-inferrable-types.name: @typescript-eslint/no-inferrable-types
@typescript-eslint/no-inferrable-types.description: 禁止给一个初始化时直接赋值为 number, string 的变量显式的声明类型
@typescript-eslint/no-inferrable-types.comments:
/**
     * 禁止给一个初始化时直接赋值为 number, string 的变量显式的声明类型
     * @reason 可以简化代码
     */
@typescript-eslint/no-inferrable-types.badExample: let foo1: number = 1; let bar1: string = ''; However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-inferrable-types.goodExample: const foo2 = 1; const bar2 = '';

@typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises.name: @typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises
@typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises.description: 禁止对 promise 的误用，详见示例
@typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises.badExample: const promise2 = (value) => new Promise((resolve, reject) => { setTimeout(() => resolve(value), 1000); }); async function foo2() { if (promise2(1)) { // Do something } } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">>
@typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises.goodExample: const promise1 = (value) => new Promise((resolve, reject) => { setTimeout(() => resolve(value), 1000); }); async function foo1() { if (await promise1(1)) { // Do something } }

@typescript-eslint/no-namespace.name: @typescript-eslint/no-namespace
@typescript-eslint/no-namespace.description: 禁止使用 namespace 来定义命名空间
@typescript-eslint/no-namespace.comments:
/**
     * 禁止使用 namespace 来定义命名空间
     * @reason 使用 es6 引入模块，才是更标准的方式。
     * 但是允许使用 declare namespace ... {} 来定义外部命名空间
     */
@typescript-eslint/no-namespace.badExample: namespace foo1 {} However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-namespace.goodExample: declare namespace foo1 {}
@typescript-eslint/no-namespace.reason:
使用 es6 引入模块，才是更标准的方式。
但是允许使用 declare namespace ... {} 来定义外部命名空间

@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-.name: @typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-optional-chain
@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-.description: 禁止在 optional chaining 之后使用 non-null 断言（感叹号）
@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-.comments:
/**
     * 禁止在 optional chaining 之后使用 non-null 断言（感叹号）
     * @reason optional chaining 后面的属性一定是非空的
     */
@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-.badExample: let foo1: { bar: string } | undefined; console.log(foo1?.bar!); However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-.goodExample: let foo2: { bar: string } | undefined; console.log(foo2?.bar);
@typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-.reason: optional chaining 后面的属性一定是非空的

@typescript-eslint/no-parameter-properti.name: @typescript-eslint/no-parameter-properties
@typescript-eslint/no-parameter-properti.description: 禁止给类的构造函数的参数添加修饰符

@typescript-eslint/no-require-imports.name: @typescript-eslint/no-require-imports
@typescript-eslint/no-require-imports.comments:
/**
     * 禁止使用 require
     * @reason 统一使用 import 来引入模块，特殊情况使用单行注释允许 require 引入
     */
@typescript-eslint/no-require-imports.badExample: const fs = require('fs'); However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-require-imports.goodExample: import * as fs from 'fs';
@typescript-eslint/no-require-imports.reason: 统一使用 import 来引入模块，特殊情况使用单行注释允许 require 引入

@typescript-eslint/no-this-alias.name: @typescript-eslint/no-this-alias
@typescript-eslint/no-this-alias.description: 禁止将 this 赋值给其他变量，除非是解构赋值
@typescript-eslint/no-this-alias.badExample: function foo() { const self = this; setTimeout(function () { self.doWork(); }); } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-this-alias.goodExample: function foo() { const { bar } = this; setTimeout(() => { this.doWork(); }); }

@typescript-eslint/no-unused-expressions.name: @typescript-eslint/no-unused-expressions
@typescript-eslint/no-unused-expressions.badExample: declare const foo1: any; declare const bar1: any; declare const baz1: any; 1; foo1; ('foo1'); foo1 && bar1; foo1 || bar1; foo1 ? bar1 : baz1; `bar1`; However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-unused-expressions.goodExample: 'use strict'; declare const foo2: any; declare const bar2: any; declare const baz2: any; foo2 && bar2(); foo2 || bar2(); foo2 ? bar2() : baz2(); foo2`bar2`;

@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars.name: @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars
@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */
@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars.badExample: class BadA { method(foo, bar, _baz) { console.log(foo); } } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars.goodExample: export interface IModel { toList(isCompact: boolean): any[]; } export class EmptyModel implements IModel { toList(_isCompact: boolean) { return []; } } export class MyModel implements IModel { private data: any[]; toList(isCompact: boolean) { return isCompact ? this.data.flat() : this.data; } } (function () { const a = new EmptyModel(); a.toList(true); })(); const match = location.href.match(/^(.+):\/\/(.+):(\d+)\/?/); const [_result, _protocol, _hostname, port] = match; console.log(port);

@typescript-eslint/no-useless-constructo.name: @typescript-eslint/no-useless-constructor
@typescript-eslint/no-useless-constructo.description: 禁止出现没必要的 constructor
@typescript-eslint/no-useless-constructo.badExample: class Foo1 { constructor() {} } class Bar1 extends Foo1 { constructor() { super(); } } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/no-useless-constructo.goodExample: class Foo2 { constructor() { this.doSomething(); } doSomething() { } } class Bar2 extends Foo1 { constructor() { super(); this.doSomething(); } doSomething() { } }

@typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of.name: @typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of
@typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of.description: 使用 for 循环遍历数组时，如果索引仅用于获取成员，则必须使用 for of 循环替代 for 循环
@typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of.comments:
/**
     * 使用 for 循环遍历数组时，如果索引仅用于获取成员，则必须使用 for of 循环替代 for 循环
     * @reason for of 循环更加易读
     */
@typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of.badExample: const arr1 = [1, 2, 3]; for (let i = 0; i < arr1.length; i++) { console.log(arr1[i]); } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of.goodExample: const arr2 = [1, 2, 3]; for (const x of arr2) { console.log(x); } for (let i = 0; i < arr2.length; i++) { // i is used to write to arr, so for-of could not be used. arr2[i] = 0; } for (let i = 0; i < arr2.length; i++) { // i is used independent of arr, so for-of could not be used. console.log(i, arr2[i]); }
@typescript-eslint/prefer-for-of.reason: for of 循环更加易读

@typescript-eslint/prefer-function-type.name: @typescript-eslint/prefer-function-type
@typescript-eslint/prefer-function-type.description: 使用函数类型别名替代包含函数调用声明的接口
@typescript-eslint/prefer-function-type.badExample: interface Foo1 { (): string; } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/prefer-function-type.goodExample: type Foo2 = () => string;

@typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyw.name: @typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyword
@typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyw.description: 禁止使用 module 来定义命名空间
@typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyw.comments:
/**
     * 禁止使用 module 来定义命名空间
     * @reason module 已成为 js 的关键字
     */
@typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyw.badExample: module Foo1 {} However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyw.goodExample: namespace Foo2 {}
@typescript-eslint/prefer-namespace-keyw.reason: module 已成为 js 的关键字

@typescript-eslint/prefer-optional-chain.name: @typescript-eslint/prefer-optional-chain
@typescript-eslint/prefer-optional-chain.description: 使用 optional chaining 替代 &&
@typescript-eslint/prefer-optional-chain.badExample: let foo1: any; console.log(foo1 && foo1.a && foo1.a.b && foo1.a.b.c); However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/prefer-optional-chain.goodExample: let foo2: any; console.log(foo2?.a?.b?.c);

@typescript-eslint/quotes.name: @typescript-eslint/quotes
@typescript-eslint/quotes.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/quotes.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/semi.name: @typescript-eslint/semi
@typescript-eslint/semi.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/semi.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/space-before-function.name: @typescript-eslint/space-before-function-paren
@typescript-eslint/space-before-function.description: 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本
@typescript-eslint/space-before-function.comments: /** 同 JS 规则的 TS 版本 */

@typescript-eslint/triple-slash-referenc.name: @typescript-eslint/triple-slash-reference
@typescript-eslint/triple-slash-referenc.description: 禁止使用三斜杠导入文件
@typescript-eslint/triple-slash-referenc.comments:
/**
     * 禁止使用三斜杠导入文件
     * @reason 三斜杠是已废弃的语法，但在类型声明文件中还是可以使用的
     */
@typescript-eslint/triple-slash-referenc.badExample: /// <reference path="./Animal"> However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/triple-slash-referenc.goodExample: import Animal from './Animal';
@typescript-eslint/triple-slash-referenc.reason: 三斜杠是已废弃的语法，但在类型声明文件中还是可以使用的

@typescript-eslint/type-annotation-spaci.name: @typescript-eslint/type-annotation-spacing
@typescript-eslint/type-annotation-spaci.description: 在类型注释周围需要一致的间距
@typescript-eslint/type-annotation-spaci.badExample: let foo1:string = "bar"; let foo2 :string = "bar"; let foo3 : string = "bar"; function bar1():void {} function bar2() :void {} function bar3() : void {} class Foo1 { name:string; } class Foo2 { name :string; } class Foo3 { name : string; } type Bar1 = ()=> {}; However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">>
@typescript-eslint/type-annotation-spaci.goodExample: let foo4: string = "bar"; function bar4(): void { } class Foo4 { name: string; } type Bar4 = () => {};

@typescript-eslint/typedef.name: @typescript-eslint/typedef
@typescript-eslint/typedef.description: interface 和 type 定义时必须声明成员的类型
@typescript-eslint/typedef.badExample: type Foo1 = { bar; baz; }; However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/typedef.goodExample: type Foo2 = { bar: boolean; baz: string; };

@typescript-eslint/unified-signatures.name: @typescript-eslint/unified-signatures
@typescript-eslint/unified-signatures.description: 函数重载时，若能通过联合类型将两个函数的类型声明合为一个，则使用联合类型而不是两个函数声明
@typescript-eslint/unified-signatures.badExample: function foo1(x: number): void; function foo1(x: string): void; function foo1(x: any): any { return x; } However, that TSConfig does not include this file. Either: - Change ESLint's list of included files to not include this file - Change that TSConfig to include this file - Create a new TSConfig that includes this file and include it in your parserOptions.project See the typescript-eslint docs for more info: https://typescript-eslint.io/troubleshooting/typed-linting#i-get-errors-telling-me-eslint-was-configured-to-run--however-that-tsconfig-does-not--none-of-those-tsconfigs-include-this-file<br/><span class='eslint-error-rule-id'>eslint(null)</span>">
@typescript-eslint/unified-signatures.goodExample: function foo2(x: number | string): void; function foo2(x: any): any { return x; }
